review:
Dr. Adarsh is a pleasure to visit. She gives the right kind of weightage for the medical matters, she doesn’t hype any situation, neither does she underplay a diagnosis. 

I visited her for my father and it showed up in her experience even before she could look into the reports and called out the medical issue.

She also has treated my mother earlier.

I like the kind of positive energy needed from doctors, medicine is one thing and positivity for mental health is yet another important and critical aspect.

*** ** *** ******* **** ****** ** *** ***** ** ********** Been seeing her from many years now, and not just me, but each of my family members as well. 
There has been more than one incident wherein she has saved the lives of my family, and that's a big deal! 
I rate her infinity stars, and highly recommend her always and forever!

She doesn’t listen to her patients at all. She is always in a hurry to complete the appointment. Behaviour not acceptable.

As she doesn’t listen carefully, the treatment is not effective.

I donot recommend this doctor as she did not keep her words. She had told to watsup reports of blood test and told that she would send the prescription accordingly in watsup but after so many followups  she did not respond. I was expecting her reply but had to visit her next day in hospital only. This is not expected from any doctor when they tell to send the reports through watsup and no need to come to hospital in emergency cases. This was not acceptable as I kept her calling the whole day and I didn't receive any reply from her

Dr. Adarsh is an amazing Doctor and a wonderful personality. Her approach towards every patient is very positive. Lot depends on the Doctor itself that how they attend to the patient. Her knowledge towards her profession is outstanding and that reflects in the entire process of treatment.  

I wish her All the Best. Keep doing the Good Work.

She keeps updating all diagnosis techniques which is required now as we have so much infections around us which is uncommon. She also respects your secrecy if any. She is kind of family doctor to us now. I highly recommend her if you need a general physician.
I have met Dr Adarsh Nanak multiple times because of cold, throat and thyroid etc. My experience is wonderful, she is very friendly Dr. Her advice and medication worked for me.

*** ****** ** **** **** ********** She doesn’t let the patients speak. She will be reay to write medicine as and when u enter the room and gives just max 5 minutes to a patient. *** ********* ****** ****.we were taking medication from her as it’s nearby but after 3 days we had to rush to another doctor.
She's professional,friendly all the best she diagnosed very kindly thank you much doctor explanation nd observing skills are just excellent I would recommend to others
Amazing Doctor , Listens carefully and then advice. I recommend Doctor very much.  All the best !
